title: Replace lucid/glass effect with light, subtle background

requirements.text: Replace any lucid, glassmorphism, or frosted-glass background effects on the splash screen with a clean, light background. Use soft, light neutral tones (e.g., off-white, light warm gray, or very light teal tint) with a subtle gradient or gentle texture instead. All overlay panels, cards, and button containers should also use light, opaque or lightly translucent styles — no blurred glass or heavy transparency effects. Ensure text and buttons remain clearly legible against the light background.

quotes: instead of lucid thing can we use light background and instead of lucid keep it subtle

acceptanceCriteria: The splash screen background is light (off-white, warm light gray, or very light teal tint) with no dark or heavily saturated colors dominating.
No glassmorphism, frosted-glass, or backdrop-blur effects are present on the background or any overlay panels.
Any gradient or texture used is subtle and soft, not distracting.
All three buttons ('Take Me Home', 'SOS', 'Other Services') remain clearly visible and readable against the new light background.
The header/logo area and footer are styled consistently with the light, subtle background theme.
The overall feel is clean, calm, and trustworthy — not stark or clinical.

constraints: Do not alter button labels, emoji, or button hierarchy.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not introduce glassmorphism, backdrop-blur, or heavy transparency on any element.
nonGoals: Adding new buttons or navigation routes.
Modifying the backend in any way.
Redesigning the overall layout or button arrangement.
